Sentencas: Autothermal reforming, which is a combined process of steam reforming and partial oxidation reforming, has excellent coke resistance and high efficiency in reforming reactions.
Titulo: Effect of promoter on Ni/MgO catalyst in C8H18 autothermal reforming in solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Octane autothermal reforming was carried out over Ni-supported catalysts.
Titulo: Effect of promoter on Ni/MgO catalyst in C8H18 autothermal reforming in solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The catalysts were prepared by normal precipitation and promoters were added by impregnation.
Titulo: Effect of promoter on Ni/MgO catalyst in C8H18 autothermal reforming in solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The formation of NiO-MgO solid solution was accomplished during calcination of the Ni/MgO catalyst at 900 degrees C, resulting in loss of the active Ni metal and very low catalytic activity.
Titulo: Effect of promoter on Ni/MgO catalyst in C8H18 autothermal reforming in solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Therefore, all catalysts were treated by a reduction process without calcination in order to prevent the formation of NiO-MgO solid solution.
Titulo: Effect of promoter on Ni/MgO catalyst in C8H18 autothermal reforming in solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Among Ni/MgO catalysts combined with various promoters such as Ag, Cr, and Cu, Ni-Cr/MgO catalyst showed the most desirable characteristics in the aspects of its activity, stability, and resistance to carbon deposition.
Titulo: Effect of promoter on Ni/MgO catalyst in C8H18 autothermal reforming in solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: We found an optimal condition for octane autothermal reforming when steam-to-carbon ratio and oxygen-to-carbon ratio were 1.5 and 0.5, respectively.
Titulo: Effect of promoter on Ni/MgO catalyst in C8H18 autothermal reforming in solid oxide fuel cell system
